abstract: Roomy Khan faxed confidential sales and pricing information for computer chips sold by Intel to Galleon in 1998, according to court documents.
snippet: Roomy Khan faxed confidential sales and pricing information for computer chips sold by Intel to Galleon in 1998, according to court documents.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  The central witness in a federal insider trading case against Raj Rajaratnam, founder of the Galleon hedge fund, has a more than 10-year history of passing on privileged information to the fund, according to federal court documents.

headline.main: Witness in Galleon Case Is Said to Have History of Passing Secrets
headline.print_headline: Witness in Galleon Case Is Said to Have History of Passing Secrets

byline.original: By Ashlee Vance and Michael J. de la Merced
